attributes.action: instruct the appropriate watchdog (Oftel?) to order T.V. programmers not to show previews of future programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This contributes to climate change as viewers have to keep their televisions on while waiting for the start of the programme they want to watch and for which they have switched their televisons on.  Less importantly it is also very annoying!  ALL television programmes should start at the scheduled time with no delays.
